original_text: Why should ye be stricken any more? ye will revolt more and more: the whole head is sick, and the whole heart faint.
korean_text: 너희가 어찌하여 매를 더 맞으려고 패역을 거듭하느냐 온 머리는 병들었고 온 마음은 피곤하였으며

sentences.original_text: Why should ye be stricken any more?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 어찌하여 더욱 매를 맞아야 하느냐?

sentences.original_text: ye will revolt more and more:
